title: Miltefosine impacts small molecule transport in Gram-positive bacteria
content:
RSC Chem. Biol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4CB00106K, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Marea J. Blake, Eleanor F. Page, Madeline E. Smith, Tessa R. Calhoun
Second harmonic scattering reveals differences in how the drug, miltefosine, impacts small molecule transport through the membranes of living bacteria. Large scale changes to membrane order, however, are not observed suggesting localized effects.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
